name: 陳岡伯
objective:
本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course read various kinds of articles and formulate their own critical thinking. With the experience of critical reading and thinking, students will develop their own writing strategies and write three short critical essays (500-800 words) with different rhetorical modes: comparison-contrast, cause-and-effect, and argumentative. 
     Basic knowledge and skills of conducting research will be integrated into the course; students will learn how to search for relevant sources, adopt proper academic styles, and avoid plagiarism.
